name: v0.1.7
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_jar_jar", version = "0.1.7")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_jar_jar",
    sha256 = "d2159f2397b93f9e0de73dcc15d03277da5fab73fc789b3ea23edbd5f018b901",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_jar_jar-0.1.7",
    url = "https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/releases/download/v0.1.7/bazel_jar_jar-v0.1.7.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@com_github_johnynek_bazel_jar_jar//:jar_jar.bzl",
    "jar_jar_repositories",
)

jar_jar_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* Enable bzlmod for release workflow by @jklukas in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/58
* Update README to point to BCR for latest published version by @jklukas in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/59
* Fix link to examples in README.md file. by @thomaslangston in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/57

## New Contributors
* @jklukas made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/58
* @thomaslangston made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/57

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/compare/v0.1.6...v0.1.7

name: v0.1.6
body:
## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_jar_jar", version = "0.1.6")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_jar_jar",
    sha256 = "3117f913c732142a795551f530d02c9157b9ea895e6b2de0fbb5af54f03040a5",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_jar_jar-0.1.6",
    url = "https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/releases/download/v0.1.6/bazel_jar_jar-v0.1.6.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@com_github_johnynek_bazel_jar_jar//:jar_jar.bzl",
    "jar_jar_repositories",
)

jar_jar_repositories()
```

## What's Changed
* Switch to using Zulu by @eed3si9n in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/52
* Add ConfigJavaInfo to jar jar aspect by @ramyanaga in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/51
* Add config output jars to current_jars by @ramyanaga in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/53
* Updates to ExtraDependencyInfo Provider by @ramyanaga in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/54
* In jar_jar rule, enable setting jvm_flags by @thomasbao12 in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/55

## New Contributors
* @ramyanaga made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/51
* @thomasbao12 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/55

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/compare/v0.1.5...v0.1.6

0.1.1 failed to publish to BCR, 0.1.5 is identical to 0.1.1.

## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_jar_jar", version = "0.1.5")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_jar_jar",
    sha256 = "a9d2ca9a2e9014f8d63dcbe9091bcb9f2d2929b3b7d16836c6225e98f9ca54df",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_jar_jar-0.1.5",
    url = "https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/releases/download/v0.1.5/bazel_jar_jar-v0.1.5.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@com_github_johnynek_bazel_jar_jar//:jar_jar.bzl",
    "jar_jar_repositories",
)

jar_jar_repositories()
```

## What's Changed
* Updated jarjar-abrams dependency to 1.14.0 by @patrick-premont in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/48
* Update `jarjar-abrams` version to 1.13.1 by @acourtneybrown in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/44

## Behind the scenes

* Fix BCR submission: rule fails the test with Bazel 5.x by @eed3si9n in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/50
* Remove `test_targets` from BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/43

## New Contributors
* @acourtneybrown made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/44
* @patrick-premont made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/48

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.5

## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_jar_jar", version = "0.1.1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_jar_jar",
    sha256 = "2090e7cf6d67d3f08ebfda155c335b66c3615bfefbe13e6832267e6bca446b31",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_jar_jar-0.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/releases/download/v0.1.1/bazel_jar_jar-v0.1.1.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@com_github_johnynek_bazel_jar_jar//:jar_jar.bzl",
    "jar_jar_repositories",
)

jar_jar_repositories()
```


## What's Changed
* Remove `test_targets` from BCR presubmit by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/43
* Update `jarjar-abrams` version to 1.13.1 by @acourtneybrown in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/44
* Updated jarjar-abrams dependency to 1.14.0 by @patrick-premont in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/48

## New Contributors
* @acourtneybrown made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/44
* @patrick-premont made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/48

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/compare/v0.1.0...v0.1.1

This is the initial tagged release of bazel_jar_jar, a Bazel rule to create shaded JAR.

## Using Bzlmod

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc` (default with Bazel 7).
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "bazel_jar_jar", version = "0.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "bazel_jar_jar",
    sha256 = "f766a2143bf11f70a7de67798db6cd3851fedc77b7037162e052fee6207fa5ca",
    strip_prefix = "bazel_jar_jar-0.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/releases/download/v0.1.0/bazel_jar_jar-v0.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@com_github_johnynek_bazel_jar_jar//:jar_jar.bzl",
    "jar_jar_repositories",
)

jar_jar_repositories()
```

## Updates

* Jar Jar Abrams 0.11.0 by @eed3si9n in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/40
* Add support for Bzlmod by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/41
* Allow files as input to jar_jar task by @bkirwi in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/1
* Use custom bind names by @johnynek in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/2
* Provide JavaInfo so jarjar targets can be a dep of scala targets. by @beala-stripe in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/4
* Add DefaultInfo provider by @beala-stripe in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/5
* Upgrade to newest version of jar_jar. by @johnedmonds in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/6
* Add usage guidance to README.md by @thundergolfer in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/7
* Add documentation on rules file formatting by @thundergolfer in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/8
* Replace native.maven_jar with function that respects HTTP_PROXY by @beala-stripe in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/9
* Bazel 027 support by @anchlovi in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/11
* more bazel 0.27 compatibility by @apesternikov in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/12
* Prefix name for jvm_maven_import_external with "jar_jar_" to avoid name collisions by @gergelyfabian in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/16
* Fix git:// URL in readme by @Ameliorate in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/18
* Make available inline rules directly in the jar_jar rule. by @cyberfox in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/19
* Modernize Bazel setup by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/20
* Use attr.output instead of deprecated outputs dict  by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/21
* Use ijar to generate the `compile_jar` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/24
* Update ASM to 9.4 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/23
* Fix `bazel test //...` in main repository by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/22
* Add basic CI setup by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/25
* Fix remaining issues with CI workflow by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/27
* Add a note about the aspect to kick of CI by @johnynek in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/26
* Add support for multi-release jars by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/28
* Add benchmark by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/29
* Merge MethodSignatureProcessor into JarTransformerChain by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/30
* Improve remapper cache by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/31
* Remove use of `Integer` constructor by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/33
* Fix timestamp roundtripping issue by @johnynek in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/36
* revert to fix netflix by @johnynek in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/37
* Run CI on pull requests by @eed3si9n in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/39
* Switch to using Jar Jar Abrams by @eed3si9n in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/38
* Set up "push tag to release" workflow by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/42

## New Contributors
* @bkirwi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/1
* @johnynek made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/2
* @beala-stripe made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/4
* @johnedmonds made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/6
* @thundergolfer made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/7
* @anchlovi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/11
* @apesternikov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/12
* @gergelyfabian made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/16
* @Ameliorate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/18
* @cyberfox made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/19
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/20
* @eed3si9n made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/pull/39

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazeltools/bazel_jar_jar/commits/v0.1.0
